Message:
One day, I discovered
a suspicious man with a staff
wandering through town.

He seemed to be
looking for someone...

Now that I think about it,
everyone was abuzz with
gossip about a witch hunt
the next town over.

A lot of girls had been
executed, they said.

A lot of the parents too.
For hiding their daughters.
For protecting witches...

Wait...could that man
with the staff be...?!

I’m the only one in this town
who knows the truth.

The only one who’s figured out
who he really is.

The clutches of evil threaten
this town—threaten everyone.
I gotta protect them!

I started tailing him,
but soon lost sight of him.

For him to shake me off...
He’s even more suspicious
than I thought!

Just then, I heard
a piercing scream
from the town square.
